dt-option.name: searchBuilder.conditions

type.description: This is a 2D object, keyed first by the data type that the condition should apply to and then by the condition itself. The condition object must have the structure defined by `-type SearchBuilder.Condition`.

dt-option.description:
This option is an alias to `-feature searchBuilder.conditions`, which should be preferred when using DataTables 2+. It can be used to configure SearchBuilder regardless of how the panes are inserted into the document (`-init layout` or `-button searchBuilder`).
Please refer to the documentation for `-feature searchBuilder.conditions` for full details of this option.
